text:
Hi!

On a single blog post page, we want to mix both public and private information.
The private information is only supposed to be visible to site administrators. I was hoping there would be some variable available e.g. "is_admin". But I can't find anything like that in the docs? Does something like this exist, or could it be solved in any other way?

Thanks! :)

Hey all! I'm new to the Slack here, but have been in HubSpot for the last 5 or so years. My newest role has me leading a new HubSpot-hosted website and I'm in need of just a small bit of troubleshooting to get us over the finish line. Excited to connect w/ an unmatched community:slightly_smiling_face:
Hey <@U01SFCDF23T> Nice to meet you and welcome to community here!
